{"blocks":[{"key":"7f5k7","text":"Spin down the Adapter Mix (AMX) and Quick T4 Ligase, and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f2vqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"821ps","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"d13f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"88vrq","text":"Although the recommended 3rd party ligase is supplied with its own buffer, the ligation efficiency of Adapter Mix (AMX) is higher when using Ligation Buffer supplied within the Ligation Sequencing Kit.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gid9","text":"Thaw Ligation Buffer at room temperature, spin down and mix by vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gbua","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"31fsc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fbh3t","text":"Place on ice immediately after thawing and mixing.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78nhi","text":"In a 200μl PCR tube, mix in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"75jkt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2tm1f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7d6n3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["242",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["End repaired \u0026 A-tailing product","60μl",""],["Adapter Mix (AMX)","5μl","Green"],["DI Water","5μl",""],["Ligation Buffer (KAPA)","30μl","Yellow"],["NEBNext Quick T4 DNA Ligase (KAPA)","10μl","Yellow"],["Total","110μl",""]],"guid":"33B02020071D11EDA4D415CDB129DC51","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["End repaired \u0026 A-tailing product","60μl",""],["Adapter Mix (AMX)","5μl","Green"],["DI Water","5μl",""],["Ligation Buffer (KAPA)","30μl","Yellow"],["NEBNext Quick T4 DNA Ligase (KAPA)","10μl","Yellow"],["Total","110μl",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jddl","text":"Ensure the components are thoroughly mixed by pipetting, and spin down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fdug","text":"Using a thermal cycler, incubate at     .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"vv4k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a8efu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"73394AC4FC2111ECB2770A58A9FEAC02","id":"50182","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"73394B6FFC2111ECB2770A58A9FEAC02","id":"81036","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"20","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cqvdf","text":"During incubation, take out LFB, SQB, FLT, FLB from the frige 30 minutes earlier to thaw on ice.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a7n0c","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hdsp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9lrfh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8l65v","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5dbgd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["361",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["Ligation product","110μl",""],["Agencourt AMPure XP beads","44μl","Stored in 4°C"],["Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) or Short Fragment Buffer (SFB)\n","250μl (twice)","Orange \u0026 Grey"],["Elution Buffer from the Oxford Nanopore kit (EB)","14μl","Black"]],"guid":"470E6380078A11EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["Ligation product","110μl",""],["Agencourt AMPure XP beads","44μl","Stored in 4°C"],["Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) or Short Fragment Buffer (SFB)\n","250μl (twice)","Orange \u0026 Grey"],["Elution Buffer from the Oxford Nanopore kit (EB)","14μl","Black"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aoddq","text":"Transfer the DNA sample (110μl) to a clean 1.5 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3l3i9","text":"Resuspend the AMPure XP beads by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fq538","text":"Add 44 μl (0.4X) of resuspended AMPure XP beads to the adapter-ligated reaction and mix by pipetting. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34uk6","text":"Incubate on a Hula mixer (rotator mixer) for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40g9h","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on a magnet. Keep the tube on the magnet, and pipette off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b94us","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3gjpo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"alk6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"api8j","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colorless, for at least 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3a9te","text":"Wash the beads by adding either 250 μl Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) or 250 μl Short Fragment Buffer (SFB). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dgf0u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"92t33","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7mr8i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fdlae","text":"Depending on the wash buffer (LFB or SFB) used, the clean-up step after adapter ligation is designed to either enrich for DNA fragments of \u003e3 kb, or purify all fragments equally.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nter","text":"Flick the beads to resuspend, spin down, then return the tube to the magnetic rack and allow the beads to pellet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8ponv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"16voe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bd274","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colorless, for at least 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2mj03","text":"Remove the supernatant using a pipette and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5q8b0","text":"Repeat the previous step 3.6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rdch","text":"Spin down and place the tube back on the magnet. Pipette off any residual supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ep52","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bgroo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8n0df","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colourless, for at least 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhr14","text":"Allow to dry for ~30 seconds, but do not dry the pellet to the point of cracking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71k8m","text":"Remove the tube from the magnetic rack and resuspend the pellet in 14 μl Elution Buffer (EB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5trs","text":"Spin down and incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fdb0b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bpkuo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ev6r4","text":"For high molecular weight DNA, incubating at 37°C can improve the recovery of long fragments","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5978f","text":"Remove and retain 14 μl of eluate containing the DNA library into a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1d02p","text":"Quantify 1 μl of eluted sample using a Qubit fluorometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"609jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"df9dq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8a8km","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dq1uc","text":"The prepared library is used for loading into the flow cell. Store the library on ice until ready to load.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bubpf","text":"Thaw the flow cell, Sequencing Buffer (SQB), Loading Beads (LB), Flush Tether (FLT) and one tube of Flush Buffer (FB) at room temperature.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c1ovh","text":"Remove the flow cell from the machine and slide the priming port clockwise to open the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7m4h","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8fkfl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5DA07590079211EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","height":309,"id":270864,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3878.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iisubm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iissbm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iistbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iisrbm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"da5s5","text":"After opening the priming port, check for a small air bubble under the cover. Draw back a small volume to remove any bubbles (a few μl):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqvkd","text":"1. Set a P1000 pipette to 200 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3htr0","text":"2. Insert the tip into the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3ro3","text":"3. steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"97q0l","text":"To prepare the flow cell priming mix, add 30 μl of thawed and mixed Flush Tether (FLT) directly to the tube of thawed and mixed Flush Buffer (FB), and mix by vortexing at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2bgjc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"q741","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ucj1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cp6il","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5rik6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["130",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["Flush Tether (FLT)","30μl","Purple"],["Flush Buffer (FB)","New one","Blue"],["Total","1.2ml",""]],"guid":"C00CC1E0079011EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["Flush Tether (FLT)","30μl","Purple"],["Flush Buffer (FB)","New one","Blue"],["Total","1.2ml",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b7gbr","text":"Load 800 μl of the priming mix into the flow cell via the priming port, avoiding the introduction of air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhsfo","text":"Wait for 5 minutes. During this time, prepare the library for loading by following the steps below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an0r2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24ufg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9bg3u","text":"Closed the priming port","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2j5t3","text":"Thoroughly mix the contents of the Loading Beads (LB) by flick.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c46tq","text":"In a new tube, prepare the library for loading as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1musn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"13jg5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"eh9v","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["304",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["Sequencing Buffer (SQB)","37.5μl","Red"],["Loading Beads (LB),mixed immediately before use","25.5μl","Pink"],["DNA library","12μl",""],["Total","75μl",""]],"guid":"34DA8500078E11EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Reagent","Volume","Color"],["Sequencing Buffer (SQB)","37.5μl","Red"],["Loading Beads (LB),mixed immediately before use","25.5μl","Pink"],["DNA library","12μl",""],["Total","75μl",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"62tns","text":"Complete the flow cell priming:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c8uc","text":"1. Gently lift the SpotON sample port cover to make the SpotON sample port accessible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f6oo1","text":"2. Load 200 μl of the priming mix into the flow cell via the priming port (not the SpotON sample port), avoiding the introduction of air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4f43v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7d1ej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1lsvj","text":"Load the library as soon as possible after this step.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3i5f0","text":"Mix the prepared library gently by pipetting up and down just prior to loading.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0vqk","text":"Add 75 μl of sample to the flow cell via the SpotON sample port in a dropwise fashion. Ensure each drop flows into the port before adding the next.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ham4","text":"Gently replace the SpotON sample port cover, making sure the bung enters the SpotON port, close the priming port and replace the GridION.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"em2ol","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bb3fk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A0847B90079211EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","height":309,"id":270868,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3877.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iisybm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iiswbm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iisxbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iisvbm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bokt6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1dlsg","text":"Place the tube of Wash Mix (WMX) on ice. Do not vortex the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5uilb","text":"Thaw one tube of Wash Diluent (DIL) at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c439a","text":"Mix the contents of Wash Diluent (DIL) thoroughly by vortexing, spin down briefly and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vtil","text":"In a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA tube, prepare the following Flow Cell Wash Mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bp082","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c59rm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7pnt4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["124",100,100],"data":[["Component","Volume","Color"],["Wash Mix (WMX)","2μl","Brown"],["Wash Diluent (DIL)","398μl","Brown"],["Total","400μl",""]],"guid":"CEB63260079211EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","Volume","Color"],["Wash Mix (WMX)","2μl","Brown"],["Wash Diluent (DIL)","398μl","Brown"],["Total","400μl",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fa02k","text":"Mix well by pipetting, and place on ice. Do not vortex the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91hmg","text":"Stop or pause the sequencing experiment in MinKNOW, and leave the flow cell in the device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgcp","text":"Ensure that the priming port cover and SpotON sample port cover are in the positions indicated in the figure below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tvps","text":"Using a P1000, remove all fluid from the waste channel through Waste port 1. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"egaa2","text":"As both the priming port and SpotON sample port are closed, no fluid should leave the sensor array area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d85ds","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"498q8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"83FF5890079311EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","height":309,"id":270872,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3880.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis4bm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis2bm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis3bm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iiszbm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nmm2","text":"Rotate the flow cell priming port cover clockwise so that the priming port is visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7ugg","text":"Check for air between the priming port and the sensor array. If necessary, using a P1000 draw back a small volume to remove any air (a few μls):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ltoe","text":"1. Set a P1000 pipette to 200 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atm2d","text":"2. Insert the tip into the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gq8j","text":"3. Turn the wheel until the dial shows 220-230 μl, or until you can see a small volume of buffer/liquid entering the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bd57","text":"4. Visually check that there is continuous buffer from the priming port across the sensor array.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"863vl","text":"Load 400 μl of the prepared Flow Cell Wash Mix into the flow cell via the priming port, avoiding the introduction of air.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7el1o","text":"Close the priming port and wait for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cfb2","text":"Ensure that the priming port cover and SpotON sample port cover are in the positions indicated in the figure below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56ng0","text":"Using a P1000, remove all fluid from the waste channel through Waste port 1. As both the priming port and SpotON sample port are closed, no fluid should leave the sensor array area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3v1cf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"694us","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ennu9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4co9k","text":"It is vital that the flow cell priming port and SpotON sample port are closed to prevent air from being drawn across the sensor array area, which would lead to a significant loss of sequencing channels.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B45AF440079311EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","height":309,"id":270876,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3880.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis8bm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis6bm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis7bm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis5bm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"19hpa","text":"Thaw one tube of Storage Buffer (S) at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7iohd","text":"Mix contents thoroughly by pipetting and spin down briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"abs9n","text":"Rotate the flow cell priming port cover clockwise so that the priming port is visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cu2rb","text":"Check for air between the priming port and the sensor array. If necessary, using a P1000 draw back a small volume to remove any air (a few μls):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l7bj","text":"1. Set a P1000 pipette to 200 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kaut","text":"2. Insert the tip into the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sio4","text":"3. Turn the wheel until the dial shows 220-230 μl, or until you can see a small volume of buffer/liquid entering the        pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lvaj","text":"4. Visually check that there is continuous buffer from the priming port across the sensor array.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2k2d3","text":"Slowly add 500 μl of Storage Buffer (S) through the priming port of the flow cell.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"320hs","text":"Close the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6tmn1","text":"Using a P1000, remove all fluid from the waste channel through Waste port 1. As both the priming port and SpotON sample port are closed, no fluid should leave the sensor array area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2bt13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5rd83","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"11ha1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7q63f","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2u0if","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3qr0q","text":"It is vital that the flow cell priming port and SpotON sample port are closed to prevent air from being drawn across the sensor array area, which would lead to a significant loss of sequencing channels.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DC816D50079311EDA3B1F77A3E3E38F4","height":309,"id":270880,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3880.PNG","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iitcbm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iitabm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iitbbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iis9bm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"daos2","text":"The flow cell can now be stored at 4-8°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step6. Store the MinION/GridION flow cell for later use
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7udgs","text":"When you wish to reuse the flow cell, remove the flow cell from storage, and allow it to warm to room temperature for ~5 minutes. You will need to perform a Flow Cell Check before loading the next library.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2bru2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1qhs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"e346i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drri3","text":"We recommend storing libraries in Eppendorf DNA LoBind tubes at 4°C for short term storage or repeated use, for example, re-loading flow cells between washes.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d9kde","text":"For single use and long term storage of more than 3 months, we recommend storing libraries at -80°C in Eppendorf DNA LoBind tubes.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6dskc","text":"For further information, please refer to the DNA library stability Know-How document.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
